meanings.definition: A young salmon that has returned to freshwater after one winter at sea.
meanings.sent1: The grilse swam swiftly upstream in the river.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen were excited to catch a grilse during the fishing season.
meanings.sent3: The grilse tried to jump over a tiny waterfall but ended up splashing everyone nearby.
meanings.sent4: The determined grilse fought against the strong current to reach its spawning grounds.
meanings.sent5: Children gathered by the riverbank to watch the silver grilse leaping out of the water.

meanings.definition: A small salmon or sea trout.
meanings.sent1: We spotted a grilse swimming gracefully in the clear stream.
meanings.sent2: The grilse was too small to be kept, so it was released back into the water.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous otter tried to catch the grilse but failed each time.
meanings.sent4: The grilse darted through the water like a silver arrow.
meanings.sent5: The fishermen admired the vibrant colors of the grilse as it swam past their boat.
